amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the level of permanent stationed U.S. troops in Europe from 100,000 to 25,000 by fiscal year 2002.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 21 and printed in H. Rept. 106-175 to reduce troop levels in Europe from 100,000 to 25,000 by fiscal year 20002; excludes troops assigned to Greenland, Iceland, Azores, and those serving for more than 179 days under a military-to-military program; and does not apply in the event of war or attack on NATO member nation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shays amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 116 - 307 (Roll no. 190).
